lead_paragraph: Two defectors from the Manhattan food industry created the iPhone app Combrr to let sunbathers skip the long lines at a Queens concession stand.

headline.print_headline: Snacks Direct to a Beach Towel
headline.main: Food Delivered to Your Beach Towel

snippet: Two defectors from the Manhattan food industry created the iPhone app Combrr to let sunbathers skip the long lines at a Queens concession stand....
abstract: Justin Harter and Matthew Blance-Stephany create Combrr, proposed food delivery app for Rockaway Beach goers who hate long lines at boardwalk concessions; owners of CitySticks Parlor, gourmet frozen treat shop at Beach 97th Street, says app should increase business for stands, which have been credited with turning beaches into culinary hubs; plan end-of-summer rollout of app, initially offering deliveries from just two establishments.
